name: Base Defender (The_Tinker)
description:
Defend your base against the endless waves of enemies in outer space!

How To Play :

- Press left arrow or "A" to make weapon turn anticlockwise

- Press right arrow or "D" to make weapon turn clockwise

- Press up arrow or "W" to increase the number of lasers being shot (it also slows down the weapon's rotation)

- Press down arrow or "S" to activate flares (can be reused after 1 second)

- Press Space to Pause/Resume Game

    => While being paused :

        => Press "R" to reload game

        => Press "H" to go to home screen
